```{r}


## write a fucntion that creates a plot of normal distirbution
plot_normal <- function(mean = 0, sd = 1) {
  x <- seq(-4, 4, length=100)
  y <- dnorm(x, mean, sd)
  plot(x, y, type="l", xlab="x", ylab="Density", main="Normal Distribution")
}
```
